document.full_text: kobe bryant and pau gasol exploded for 23 of los angeles' 29 points in the third quarter to guide the two-time defending nba champions to a 98-80 victory that clinched their western conference series against the new orleans hornets on thursday.
document.title: lakers rout hornets to advance, hawks close out magic
lines_and_colors: kobe bryant and pau gasol exploded for 23 of los angeles' 29 points in the third quarter to guide the two-time defending nba champions to a 98-80 victory that clinched their western conference series against the new orleans hornets on thursday.
